short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any web page to DOCX.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly convert any webpage to a DOCX document, that can be opened in Microsoft Word and other applications. This extension reads the content of the current web page and sends it to GrabzIt's API for conversion before automatically downloading it to your computer. 

Once you have installed your extension just follow the instructions in the extension popup to sign up and get converting! 

While using GrabzIt is and always will be free forever. After your automatic premium free trial expires you can optionally upgrade to hide cookie notices, increase your monthly allowance, and set headers and footers.

You can even secure your DOCX by setting a password for the document.
